name: Robo Rescue
description:
Made as a part of Weekly Game Jam
-  Week 51 'Zero to Hero'

A bully is being a menace in the nearby park. Consume metal to grow bigger and defeat the bully.

Controls:

     A/D to move

     S to go through platforms

     Space to jump

     " . " to attack

*Art is incomplete at the moment

Lead DeveloperAndy BaeProgrammers Andy Bae and mcurasyaComposerthelastrewindArtistWebb MontgomeryLevel DesignEmily Sasaki

Assets:
